title: Albert Locke
text:
Albert Locke was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and manager.
Career.
Locke played club football for the French teams <a href="Le%20Havre%20AC">Le Havre</a> and <a href="AS%20Saint-%C3%89tienne">Saint-Étienne</a>.
He also managed Saint-Étienne between 1932 and 1934.
